channel.title: CVE Feed for Palo Alto -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Palo Alto -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-1569|2024-08-04T18:20:27.788Z -- palo%20alto -- palo%20alto%20networks%20expedition%20migration%20tool
item.description: The Expedition Migration tool 1.1.8 and earlier may allow an authenticated attacker to run arbitrary JavaScript or HTML in the User Mapping Settings for account name of admin user.

item.title: CVE-2019-1576|2024-08-04T18:20:28.275Z -- palo%20alto -- palo%20alto%20networks%20pan-os
item.description: Command injection in PAN-0S 9.0.2 and earlier may allow an authenticated attacker to gain access to a remote shell in PAN-OS, and potentially run with the escalated userâ€™s permissions.

item.title: CVE-2019-1571|2024-08-04T18:20:27.865Z -- palo%20alto -- palo%20alto%20networks%20expedition%20migration%20tool
item.description: The Expedition Migration tool 1.1.8 and earlier may allow an authenticated attacker to run arbitrary JavaScript or HTML in the RADIUS server settings.

item.title: CVE-2019-1570|2024-08-04T18:20:28.253Z -- palo%20alto -- palo%20alto%20networks%20expedition%20migration%20tool
item.description: The Expedition Migration tool 1.1.8 and earlier may allow an authenticated attacker to run arbitrary JavaScript or HTML in the LDAP server settings.

item.title: CVE-2019-1575|2024-08-04T18:20:28.319Z -- palo%20alto -- palo%20alto%20networks%20pan-os
item.description: Information disclosure in PAN-OS 7.1.23 and earlier, PAN-OS 8.0.18 and earlier, PAN-OS 8.1.8-h4 and earlier, and PAN-OS 9.0.2 and earlier may allow for an authenticated user with read-only privileges to extract the API key of the device and/or the username/password from the XML API (in PAN-OS) and possibly escalate privileges granted to them.
